# isTransitioningToCenterIndexPath

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is changing index paths.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isTransitioningToCenterIndexPath: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to determine whether the cell is changing focus to another cell.

## Managing transitions

- **parallaxFactor**: A value that specifies how slowly the background should move relative to the foreground.
